p: MSCs modified with targeting DNA hypermethylation of genes in the SWH pathway ( me_SWH-treated MSCs) had better proliferation and differentiation ability than unmodified MSCs. After induction in NIM, both non-treated and me_SWH-treated MSCs showed a neural-like morphology and were TH positive. Their neural differentiation patterns were very similar to each other. However, me_SWH-treated MSCs differentiated faster than non-treated MSCs. After induction, the me_SWH-treated MSCs also secreted more BDNF ( Fig 2). me_SWH-treated MSCs have demonstrated enhanced proliferation and differentiation and were not found to be tumorigenic in a nude mice assay [ 17]. Thus, me_SWH-treated MSCs are an ideal model for the study of stem cell differentiation.
